mapper.insert: insert into w_project(project_num, sts, create_date, user_num, liquor_type, title, w_desc, FIRST_IMG_FILENAME) values(#{projectNum}, default, default, #{userNum}, #{liquorType}, #{title}, #{projectDesc}, #{firstImgFilename})
mapper.update: update w_project set liquor_type = #{liquorType}, title = #{title}, w_desc = #{projectDesc}, FIRST_IMG_FILENAME = #{firstImgFilename} WHERE project_num = #{projectNum}
mapper.select: SELECT project_num,FIRST_IMG_FILENAME, title from w_project order by project_num desc
SELECT end_date+1 as execute_Timestamp from w_project where project_num = #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT project_num, title, w_desc, first_img_filename, first_video, target_amount, TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS start_date, TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS end_date, TO_CHAR(end_date+1, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS pay_date, TO_CHAR(TRUNC(end_date-sysdate)) AS remain_date, sts, TO_CHAR(create_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS create_date, liquor_type, TO_CHAR(p_modify_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS p_modify_date, maker_name, maker_desc, user_num, profil_img_filename
FROM w_project WHERE project_num=#{projectNum}

SELECT PROJECT_NUM, TITLE, W_DESC, FIRST_IMG_FILENAME, FIRST_VIDEO, TARGET_AMOUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, STS, CREATE_DATE, LIQUOR_TYPE, P_MODIFY_DATE, MAKER_NAME, MAKER_DESC, PROFIL_IMG_FILENAME FROM W_PROJECT WHERE title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
mapper.update: update w_project set P_MODIFY_DATE = default, sts = '심사중' WHERE project_num = #{projectNum}
update w_project set sts='승인' WHERE PROJECT_NUM=#{projectNum}
update w_project set sts='반려' WHERE PROJECT_NUM=#{projectNum}
mapper.select: SELECT PROJECT_NUM, TITLE, W_DESC, FIRST_IMG_FILENAME, STS, LIQUOR_TYPE, USER_NUM, TARGET_AMOUNT FROM w_project WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND (STS = '진행중' OR STS = '종료')
select PROJECT_NUM, TITLE, W_DESC, FIRST_IMG_FILENAME, STS, LIQUOR_TYPE, profil_img_filename from w_project WHERE LIQUOR_TYPE = #{liquorType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}and sts='진행중'
